title: ［北角要人，圍佢老母］政府今晚6點已約各國領事到北角

replies.msg:
今晚6點，北角圍佢老母！
今晚8點，18區全民帶口罩/面罩起義！
即時起，全面大三罷，直至政府全面回應訴求！
最終情況，香港獨立！

Dear Heads of Post,

Kindly be informed that a briefing session will be held by the Chief Secretary for Administration to update you of the current situation in Hong Kong today.  Details are as follow.  

Date:                           4 October 2019 (Friday)
Start time:         6:00 pm
Venue:                        Auditorium, 5/F, North Point Government Offices, 333 Java Road, North Point, Hong Kong
                [Due to venue constraint and traffic consideration, no parking spaces would be provided.]  

We should be most grateful if you could confirm your attendance (by filling in the following reply slip and inform us by return mail) on or before 3:00 pm.  Due to capacity constraint, each party is welcome to send a representative to attend.  

For enquiries, please contact Mr Hayden Choi at 2810 3005 / 9138 3240 or Ms Ceci Tang at 2810 2051 / 9092 7532.  I sincerely apologise for the rush.

Yours faithfully,

Mr Joseph Siu
Deputy Director of Protocol
要小心搞到人地領事
推啊

入面署名個JOSEPH SIU

= 蕭永豪 禮賓處副處長
佢明明係駐政總

有政總但約人去北角開會
想靠黑社會保護？

圍領事
北角政府合署auditorium可坐140人
定係想外邊塞人，等d参與者入吾到去聽政府sell呀?
唔係要圍領事，係令佢哋知道有幾多人反對，唔好比淋病政府sell到條仆街法
